BI & DATA VISUALIZATION
Our BI and Visualization platform can help in the following areas:
1
Creating standardized dashboard, performance metrics & visualization application based on the business requirements through visualization techniques
2
Developing, standardizing and maintaining analytics reporting & visualization framework to be utilized across the organization
3
Support efforts to ensure data integrity across all platforms and departments
4
Creating dashboards with process performance metrics, targets and triggers
5
Real time monitoring system of business processes and creating automated alerts
